body_html:
Well, sample should be dealt with separately really, but for log_cdf please see 2.3 in:
https://arxiv.org/pdf/1509.01631.pdf
This should hopefully extend to non-log versions and to the Beta distribution.

body:
Well, `sample` should be dealt with separately really, but for `log_cdf` please see 2.3 in:
https://arxiv.org/pdf/1509.01631.pdf
This should hopefully extend to non-log versions and to the Beta distribution.
